## AbstractResponseBuilder.withActiveContext() method

Active contexts provide guidance to the NLU to help it better select the next intent from the user's utterance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract withActiveContext(context: ActiveContext | ActiveContext[]): AbstractResponseBuilder<R>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  context | [ActiveContext](./stentor-models.activecontext.md) \| [ActiveContext](./stentor-models.activecontext.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Either a single context or array of contexts. |

[AbstractResponseBuilder](./stentor-models.abstractresponsebuilder.md)<!-- -->&lt;R&gt;

The builder instance
